questions.Question: When a vehicle approaches an unguarded railway level crossing, before crossing it, the driver shall
questions.answer1:
Stop the vehicle on the left side of the road, get down from the vehicle, go to the railway track,and
ensure that no train or trolley is coming from either side
questions.answer2: Sound horn and cross the track as fast as possible
questions.correct:
Stop the vehicle on the left side of the road, get down from the vehicle, go to the railway track,and
